column1: Belidzhi (Russian: Белиджи́) is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) in Derbentsky District of the Republic of Dagestan
It was established in 1899. Urban-type settlement status was granted to it in 1965.
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: the urban-type settlement of Belidzhi is incorporated within Derbentsky District as Belidzhi Settlement (an administrative division of the district). As a municipal division
column3: Belidzhi Settlement is incorporated within Derbentsky Municipal District as Belidzhi Urban Settlement.
